title: Read and Tidy Acoustic Emission Data — tidyAE
text: function reads processes Mistras Acoustic Emission (AE) data Excel file.

title: Read and Tidy Acoustic Emission Data — tidyAE
Read and Tidy Acoustic Emission Data — tidyAE
Read and Tidy Acoustic Emission Data — tidyAE
text: AEdata_filepath AEdata_filepath string specifying file path Excel file containing AE data. xlsheet xlsheet string specifying name Excel sheet read. Default "Line Display". skip_lines integer specifying number lines skip beginning Excel sheet. Default 1.

title: Read and Tidy Acoustic Emission Data — tidyAE
Read and Tidy Acoustic Emission Data — tidyAE
text: tibble returned : - Filtered start row containing "ID" - Filtered remove rows CH number - Date time parsed original timestamp microseconds processed - Additional time-based columns added (DateDiff, WDay, Day, Hour) - Filtered specific date range (2024-09-27 2024-10-15) - Removed original timestamp column - Reordered columns (character columns first, numeric)

title: Read and Tidy Acoustic Emission Data — tidyAE
